Verses: 1 endha Manushanum Melaana Adhigaaramullavargalukkuk Keezhppadiyakkadavan; Enendraal, Dhevanaaleyandri Oru Adhigaaramumillai; Undaayirukkira Adhigaarangal Dhevanaale Niyamikkappattirukkiradhu.
2 aadhalaal Adhigaaraththirku Edhirththu Nirkiravan Dhevanudaiya Niyamaththirku Edhirththu Nirkiraan; Appadi Edhirththu Nirkiravargal Thangalukkuth Thaangale Aakkinaiyai Varuviththukkollugiraargal

3 melum Adhigaarigal Narkiriyaigalukkalla, Dhurkkiriyaigalukke Bayangaramaayirukkiraargal; Aagaiyaal Nee Adhigaaraththirkup Bayappadaadhirukkavendumaanaal, Nanmaisey, Adhinaal Unakkup Pugazhchchi Undaagum.

4 unakku Nanmai Undaagumporuttu, Avan Dhevaoozhiyakkaaranaayirukkiraan. Nee Theemaiseydhaal Bayandhiru; Pattayaththai Avan Virudhaavaaip Pidiththirukkavillai; Theemaiseygiravanmel Kobaakkinai Varappannumpadi, Avan Needhiyai Seluththugira Dhevaoozhiyakkaaranaayirukkiraane.
5 aagaiyaal, Neengal Kobaakkinaiyinimiththam Maaththiramalla, Manasaatchiyinimiththamum Keezhppadiyavendum.
6 idharkaagave Neengal Variyaiyum Kodukkireergal. Avargal Indha Velaiyaip Paarththuvarugira Dhevaoozhiyakkaararaayirukkiraargale.

7 aagaiyaal Yaavarukkum Seluththavendiya Kadamaigalaich Seluththungal; Evanukku Variyaich Seluththavendiyadho Avanukku Variyaiyum, Evanukkuth Theervaiyai Seluththavendiyadho Avanukkuth Theervaiyaiyum Seluththungal; Evanukkup Bayappadavendiyadho Avanukkup Bayappadungal; Evanaik Ganampannavendiyadho Avanaik Ganampannungal.
8 oruvaridaththiloruvar Anbukoorugira Kadaneyallaamal, Matrondrilum Oruvanukkum Kadanpadaadhirungal; Piranidaththil Anbukoorugiravan Niyaayappiramaanaththai Niraivetrugiraan.

9 eppadiyendraal, Vibachaaram Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kolai Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kalavu Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Poisaatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga, Ichchiyaadhiruppaayaaga Engira Indhakkarpanaigalum, Vere Endhak Karpanaiyum, Unnidaththil Nee Anbukoorugiradhupolap Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga Engira Ore Vaarththaiyile Thogaiyaai Adangiyirukkiradhu.
10 anbaanadhu Piranukkup Pollaanguseyyaadhu; Aadhalaal Anbu Niyaayappiramaanaththin Niraiverudhalaayirukkiradhu.

11 niththiraiyaivittu Ezhundhirukkaththakka Velaiyaayitrendru, Naam Kaalaththai Arindhavargalaai, Ippadi Nadakkavendum; Naam Visuvaasigalaanapodhu Ratchippu Sameebamaayirundhadhaip Paarkkilum Ippozhudhu Adhu Namakku Adhiga Sameebamaayirukkiradhu.
12 iravu Sendrupoyitru, Pagal Sameebamaayitru; Aagaiyaal Andhagaaraththin Kiriyaigalai Naam Thallivittu, Oliyin Aayudhangalaith Thariththukkollakkadavom.
13 kaliyaattum Veriyum, Vesiththanamum Kaamavigaaramum, Vaakkuvaadhamum Poraamaiyum Ullavargalaai Nadavaamal, Pagalile Nadakkiravargalpolach Seeraai Nadakkakkadavom.
14 thurichchaigalukku Idamaaga Udalaip Penaamalirundhu, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvaith Thariththukkollungal.
